name: Sunset Bliss
preparation: In a shaker filled with ice, combine vodka and orange juice. Shake well. Pour over ice into a chilled highball glass. Tilt the glass and slowly pour grenadine along the side so it settles at the bottom, creating a layered effect.
backstory: The Sunset Bliss was inspired by the breathtaking sunsets over tropical coastlines. Created to capture the essence of a perfect evening, the layers of this drink mimic the spectacular hues of the sky as the sun dips below the horizon. Designed for those who enjoy sweet, fruity delights, it's a celebration of simple ingredients blending to form a masterpiece.
